The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been shared more than 22,000 times.
The misleading Facebook post had an Urdu: language caption that translated to English as "A painful scene from an ICU of a British hospital."
The claim is false: as a Google reverse image search found that the photo has been circulating online since at least 2017.
The photo was originally published in an: 2017 report by the Pakistan-based English-language newspaper The Nation, showing former Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif visiting the house of the sister of Defence Minister Khurram Dastagir Khan.
